name: Heroes of Mavia
description: Heroes of Mavia is a mobile Web3 MMO Strategy game developed by Skrice Studios. The game takes place in a fantasy-themed island called Mavia, where players build bases on plots of land and battle neighboring bases and armies to earn in-game resources, such as Ruby. Ruby can be used to craft and trade Legendary Items (NFTs) such as skins, statues, consumables and more.
